description: OS command injection vulnerability exists in Deco BE65 Pro firmware versions prior to "Deco BE65 Pro(JP)_V1_1.1.2 Build 20250123". If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary OS command may be executed by the user who can log in to the device.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: firmware versions prior to "Deco BE65 Pro(JP)_V1_1.1.2 Build 20250123"
